Game.Name: Totally Spies! 2 - Undercover (USA) (En,Fr)
Game.plot: After a successful first foray into video games, Totally Spies! returns in the second installment for the fans of the series. Players again control the three secret agents from the TV show: Sam, Alex, and Clover. The characters are sent on top secret missions and match wits and muscle against international villains all over the world.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/933955.html
